synopsis.native: Jérem s'installe dans la maison de sa mémé pour y composer son premier disque. Il y fait la rencontre de So, mystérieuse enquêtrice pour le compte de la start-up Digital Cool. Elle le persuade de prendre à l'essai Yves, un réfrigérateur intelligent, censé lui simplifier la vie…
synopsis.english: Jerem decides to settle at his grandma’s place to compose his first album. There, he meets So, a mysterious investigator working on behalf of the startup Digital Cool. She will persuade Jerem to try out Yves, a new kind of smart refrigerator gifted with an IA. Little by little, Yves creates bonds of friendship with Jerem and, by becoming his ghost writer, will turn him into a star. With Yves, life was supposed to be easier...
